stimulusHtml: Respond to all parts of the question.

features.html:
The government has decided to take action to reduce the pollution caused by the chemical industry. This industry is composed of profit-maximizing, perfectly competitive firms.

  1. Identify one policy that the government could implement to reduce pollution.

  2. Explain the effect the policy you identified in part (a) would have on each of the following for the firms in the chemical industry.

    1. Marginal cost

    2. Output

    3. Price

  3. Explain the effect of the policy you identified in part (a) on the efficiency of the allocation of societyâ€™s resources.
